rules_text:
You may remove X counters from a black planeswalker you control rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Exile the top X cards of each opponent's library. As long as those cards remained exiled, you may play lands and cast spells from among them during your turn, and mana of any type can be spent to play them.
flavor_text:
[i]“I didn't choose brilliance, brilliance chose me.”
—Marston, Grand Artificer[/i]
